Posts.Content: w0nderland wrote: I am arranging an appointment tomorrow for Drs but was wondering whether anyone here had any experience/knowledge of this to ease my mind a bit. I have noticed on both breasts something firm inside the inner side of both breasts, these are in the same place on both so not too worried about that.  However, I also noticed that if I pull the skin/lift the breast up the skin there are dimples around these firm areas on both sides. This isn't noticeable unless I do this pulling of the (very loose) skin around my breast and the dimples aren't there if I lift my arms up, flex my muscles etc Any ideas?  I am 21 with no family history, Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Dimpling only when pull skin...confused w0nderland Moderators

Posts.Content: Jul 14, 2014 03:10PM w0nderland wrote: quick update - went to doctors for an eczema problem and asked her to have a look. She told me it was the milk glands, so hopefully that's all it is.
